commit.message:
re PR tree-optimization/22336 (ICE Segfault in record_block_change at function.c:5498)

            Laurent GUERBY  <laurent@guerby.net>

        PR tree-optimization/22336

        cfun->ib_boundaries_block.

From-SVN: r102272
